name: PortaLogica
description:
PORTALOGICA

PortaLogica is a 2D-topdown game in which players are able to explore the world of logic gates in an abandoned setting. Players will meet P.E.T.E.R. and be guided throughout the game. Players can learn about logic gates and circuits, and be able to create their own logic/digital circuit. Learning that is made fun.

Special thanks to:

Yanin for the Top-Down tileset,
Mounir Tohami for the pixel GUI, 
szadi art for the visuals of our main character,
jonbtz for the robot guide P.E.T.E.R.,
Ooame and clonethirteen for the music.


This game is created as a requirement for capstone/thesis purposes.
